title: 2.18 Modern Debates: Scandal of the Dead Sea Scrolls
itunes:title: Modern Debates: Scandal of the Dead Sea Scrolls
description: The Biblical find of the century, the Dead Sea Scrolls, were turned over to an international committee for study. Bad idea. The cabal refused to let the wider scholarly community examine the documents, and forced their own interpretations on the world. The cabal bamboozled first the Jordanian authorities, then the Israelis. The cabal's stranglehold was only broken by a bunch of academic freedom-fighters in the 1990s.
content:encoded: The Biblical find of the century, the Dead Sea Scrolls, were turned over to an international committee for study. Bad idea. The cabal refused to let the wider scholarly community examine the documents, and forced their own interpretations on the world. The cabal bamboozled first the Jordanian authorities, then the Israelis. The cabal's stranglehold was only broken by a bunch of academic freedom-fighters in the 1990s.
itunes:subtitle: For more than 40 years, a small group of scholars jealously monopolised the Biblical find of the century. It was the greatest academic scandal of the 20th century.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
